description.brief: Libary to generate message according to the FIPA (Foundation for Intellsical Agents) specification

package.description:
FIPA (Foundation for Intelligent Physical Agents) specifies a general architecture including the layout of the agents dialogs. This library implements the message generation of FIPA Message according to the specification.
Thomas Roehr/thomas.roehr@dfki.de
http://www.fipa.org http://
